name: Intern Purgatory: Limbo
description: Welcome to Tough Guy Mountain. It is the first day of your unpaid internship. You are an unpaid intern. This is your live/work cubicle. It floats blissfully through the endless clean white space known as intern purgatory. Intern Purgatory is a but a single floor inside the corporate HQ of Tough Guy Mountain, but the work of the intern is the foundation that makes this company great.
